[vc_row][vc_column][cms_space space_lg=”24″ space_md=”24″][cms_heading subtitle=”Get In Touch” subtitle_color=”#c4273a” text=”Contact Us” text_color=”#222222″ description=”We understand the importance of approaching each work integrally and believe
in the power of simple and easy communication.” cms_template=”cms_heading–layout2.php”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1554364987658{margin-top: 42px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1657911558315{margin-top: 35px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;border-left-color: #e7e7e7 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e7e7e7 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e7e7e7 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e7e7e7 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Mumbai Office

Phone: +91 2246051430

Email: newlane@newlanelogistics.com

Address: Skylark premises – Office No. 312/3rd floor, Plot 63,
Sector 11, CBD Belapur, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400614.

Hours: Mon-Sat: 10 am – 6 pm

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1682404248539{margin-top: 42px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1657911310719{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-right: 1px !important;}”][cms_contact_form id=”627″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1657954200723{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1554285962130{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][cms_space space_sm=”60″ space_xs=”60″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
